name: Chanel BS
description:
This game developed in one week by two game design students, proposes you, in a atmospheric experience, full of metaphors, a criticism of our system that makes up a harsh reality by misleading advertising, a delusional policy, a fake happiness and much more... Would you DESTROY what makes us blind ? 

Credits

 This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. 

 Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai 

"Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
